RelativeTemporalAnnotation.TEXT: ADMISSION DATE : 12/4/95 DISCHARGE DATE : 12/8/95 COURSE IN HOSPITAL : The patient was hydrated well and given Adriamycin 27 mg and DTIC 450 mg daily for four days . He also got ifosfamide 3.6 grams a day with mesna . He tolerated treatment well and was discharged in good condition . FOLLOWUP : by private physician .
